00032   MappedContainer<SiPMCalibrations>* SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::getCalibrations(const std::string& processorName)
00033   {

00042   SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::SiPMCalibrationsProcessor() : Processor("SiPMCalibrationsProcessor")
00043   {
00044 
00045     _description = "Processor that provides a MappedContainer of SiPMCalibrations objects";
00046 
00047     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00048                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides the geometry of the detector." ,
00049                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00050                                 std::string("MyMappingProcessor") ) ;
00051 
00052     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00053                              "MIPConstantCollection" ,
00054                              "Name of the MIP constants collection"  ,
00055                              _MIPConstantColName ,
00056                              std::string("MIPConstants") ) ;
00057 
00058     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00059                              "MIPSlopeCollection" ,
00060                              "Name of the MIP slopes collection"  ,
00061                              _MIPSlopeColName ,
00062                              std::string("MIPSlopes") ) ;
00063 
00064     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00065                              "GainConstantCollection" ,
00066                              "Name of the gain constants collection"  ,
00067                              _gainConstantColName ,
00068                              std::string("gainConstants") ) ;
00069 
00070     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00071                              "GainSlopeCollection" ,
00072                              "Name of the gain slopes collection"  ,
00073                              _gainSlopeColName ,
00074                              std::string("gainSlopes") ) ;
00075 
00076     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00077                              "InterCalibrationCollection" ,
00078                              "Name of the interCalibration collection"  ,
00079                              _interCalibrationColName ,
00080                              std::string("interCalibration") ) ;
00081 
00082     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00083                              "PedestalCollection" ,
00084                              "Name of the pedestal collection"  ,
00085                              _pedestalColName ,
00086                              std::string("pedestal") ) ;
00087 
00088     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00089                              "TemperatureCollection" ,
00090                              "Name of the temperature collection",
00091                              _temperatureColName ,
00092                              std::string("AhcTemperature") ) ;
00093 
00094     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00095                             "SaturationCollection",
00096                             "Name of the saturation collection",
00097                             _saturationColName,
00098                             std::string("AhcSatCorrItep"));
00099                             
00100     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00101                             "SaturationParametersCollection",
00102                             "Name of the saturation curves parameters collection",
00103                             _saturationParametersColName,
00104                             std::string("AhcSaturationParameters"));
00105 
00106     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00107                             "PixelScaleFactorsCollection",
00108                             "Name of the pixel scale factors collection",
00109                             _pixelScaleFactorsColName,
00110                             std::string("PixelScaleFactors"));
00111 
00112     registerProcessorParameter("UseIndividualScaleFactor",
00113                                "switch for the value for the pixel scale factor,"
00114                                "0 - GlobalPixelScaleFactor 0.8 (default),"
00115                                "1 - PixelScaleFactorsCollection (database)",
00116                                _useIndividualScaleFactor,
00117                                (bool) false);
00118 
00119     registerProcessorParameter("GlobalPixelScaleFactor",
00120                                "Default (global) value for the pixel scale factor",
00121                                _globalPixelScaleFactor,
00122                                (float)0.8);
00123 
00124     registerInputCollection(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,
00125                             "CellQualityCollection",
00126                             "Collection with quality flags",
00127                             _cellQualityColName,
00128                             std::string("AhcCellQuality"));
00129                             
00130     registerProcessorParameter("SaturationProcedureType",
00131                               "Type of saturation correction applied, 0 - interpolation (default), 1 - curve",
00132                               _saturationProcedureType,
00133                               (int)0);
00134                                                           
00135 
00136     /* steering file parameters to allow systematic studies
00137      */
00138     registerOptionalParameter( "MIPConstantScaleFactor",
00139                                "factor to scale all MIP constants",
00140                                _MIPConstantScaleFactor,
00141                                (float)1. );
00142 
00143     registerOptionalParameter( "MIPSlopeScaleFactor",
00144                                "factor to scale all MIP slopes",
00145                                _MIPSlopeScaleFactor,
00146                                (float)1. );
00147 
00148     registerOptionalParameter( "GainConstantScaleFactor",
00149                                "factor to scale all gain constants",
00150                                _gainConstantScaleFactor,
00151                                (float)1. );
00152 
00153     registerOptionalParameter( "GainSlopeScaleFactor",
00154                                "factor to scale all gain slopes",
00155                                _gainSlopeScaleFactor,
00156                                (float)1. );
00157 
00158     registerOptionalParameter( "InterCalibrationScaleFactor",
00159                                "factor to scale all inter-calibration constants",
00160                                _interCalibrationScaleFactor,
00161                                (float)1. );
00162 
00163     registerOptionalParameter( "SaturationCorrectionScaleFactor",
00164                                "factor to scale the saturation correction function",
00165                                _saturationCorrectionScaleFactor,
00166                                (float)1. );
00167 
00168     registerProcessorParameter("UseDBDefaultValuesOnlyForAllCells",
00169                                "switch for using database default values only for a virtual machine,"
00170                                "true - use database default values for all cell for a virtual machine,"
00171                                "false - backward compatible, and use database",
00172                                _useDBDefaultValuesOnly,
00173                                (bool) false);
00174 
00175     _container = NULL;
00176 
00177     _MIPConstantCol              = NULL;
00178     _MIPSlopeCol                 = NULL;
00179     _gainConstantCol             = NULL;
00180     _gainSlopeCol                = NULL;
00181     _interCalibrationCol         = NULL;
00182     _pedestalCol                 = NULL;
00183     _temperatureCol              = NULL;
00184     _saturationCol               = NULL;
00185     _saturationParametersCol     = NULL;
00186     _pixelScaleFactorsCol        = NULL;
00187     _cellQualityCol              = NULL;
00188 
00189   }

00194   /***************************************************************************************/
00195   SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::~SiPMCalibrationsProcessor()
00196   {
00197     if (_container) delete _container;
00198     _SiPMCalibrationsContainerMap.erase(Processor::name());
00199   }

00201   /***************************************************************************************/
00202   /*                                                                                     */
00203   /*                                                                                     */
00204   /*                                                                                     */
00205   /***************************************************************************************/
00206   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::init()
00207   {
00208     printParameters();
00209 
00210     _MIPConstantChanged              = false;
00211     _MIPSlopeChanged                 = false;
00212     _gainConstantChanged             = false;
00213     _gainSlopeChanged                = false;
00214     _interCalibrationChanged         = false;
00215     _pedestalChanged                 = false;
00216     _temperatureChanged              = false;
00217     _saturationChanged               = false;
00218     _saturationParametersChanged     = false;
00219     _pixelScaleFactorsChanged        = false;
00220     _cellQualityChanged              = false;
00221 
00222     _MIPSlopeScaled                  = parameterSet("MIPSlopeScaleFactor");
00223     _MIPConstantScaled               = parameterSet("MIPConstantScaleFactor");
00224     _gainSlopeScaled                 = parameterSet("GainSlopeScaleFactor");
00225     _gainConstantScaled              = parameterSet("GainConstantScaleFactor");
00226     _interCalibrationScaled          = parameterSet("InterCalibrationScaleFactor");
00227     _saturationCorrectionScaled      = parameterSet("SaturationCorrectionScaleFactor");
00228 
00229     std::stringstream message;
00230     bool error = false;
00231 
00232     _mapper = MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName);
00233 
00234     if ( ! _mapper )
00235       {
00236         message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName << ") did not return a valid mapper." << std::endl;
00237         error = true;
00238       }
00239     
00240     /* registration of the conditions change listeners has to go here
00241      *
00242      * should not break immediately but append report to message and set error to true,
00243      * if registration not possible
00244      *
00245      */
00246     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _MIPConstantColName))
00247       {
00248         message << " undefined conditions: " << _MIPConstantColName << std::endl;
00249         error = true;
00250       }
00251     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _MIPSlopeColName))
00252       {
00253         message << " undefined conditions: " << _MIPSlopeColName << std::endl;
00254         error = true;
00255       }
00256     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _gainConstantColName))
00257       {
00258         message << " undefined conditions: " << _gainConstantColName << std::endl;
00259         error = true;
00260       }
00261     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _gainSlopeColName))
00262       {
00263         message << " undefined conditions: " << _gainSlopeColName << std::endl;
00264         error = true;
00265       }
00266     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _interCalibrationColName))
00267       {
00268         message << " undefined conditions: " << _interCalibrationColName << std::endl;
00269         error = true;
00270       }
00271     if (parameterSet("PedestalCollection") && !ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _pedestalColName))
00272       {
00273         message << " undefined conditions: " << _pedestalColName << std::endl;
00274         error = true;
00275       }
00276     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _temperatureColName))
00277       {
00278         message << " undefined conditions: " << _temperatureColName << std::endl;
00279         error = true;
00280       }
00281     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _saturationColName))
00282       {
00283         message << " undefined conditions: " << _saturationColName << std::endl;
00284         error = true;
00285       }
00286     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _saturationParametersColName))
00287       {
00288         message << " undefined conditions: " << _saturationParametersColName << std::endl;
00289         error = true;
00290       }
00291 
00292     if (!ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _cellQualityColName))
00293       {
00294         message << " undefined conditions: " << _cellQualityColName << std::endl;
00295         error = true;
00296       }
00297 
00298     if (error) {
00299       streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00300       throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00301     }
00302 
00303     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00304 
00305     /*I don't know if there is any pixel collection in the database already*/
00306 
00307     bool pixelScaleFactorsCollectionFound = false;
00308     if (ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(this, _pixelScaleFactorsColName))
00309       pixelScaleFactorsCollectionFound = true;
00310 
00311     /*if none of the pixel collections is found, cry out*/
00312     if (pixelScaleFactorsCollectionFound == false)
00313       {
00314         streamlog_out(WARNING) << " Could not find the pixel collections: " << _pixelScaleFactorsColName
00315                        << std::endl;
00316       }
00317 
00318     _container = new MappedContainer<SiPMCalibrations>(_mapper);
00319     _SiPMCalibrationsContainerMap[Processor::name()] = _container;
00320 
00321   }
00322 
00323   /***************************************************************************************/
00324   /* function to listen for condition changes in LCCD                                    */
00325   /*                                                                                     */
00326   /* should only remember pointer of collection and set flag for the changed conditions; */
00327   /* processing should wait till process event. this ensures that constants that depend  */
00328   /* on two different conditions collections have both collections available             */
00329   /*                                                                                     */
00330   /* the callbacks from LCCD have no guarantied order                                    */
00331   /*                                                                                     */
00332   /***************************************************************************************/
00333   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::conditionsChanged( LCCollection * col ) {
00334 
00335     std::string colName = col->getParameters().getStringVal("CollectionName") ;
00336 
00337     if (colName == _MIPConstantColName)
00338       {
00339         _MIPConstantCol = col;
00340         _MIPConstantChanged = true;
00341       }
00342     else if (colName == _MIPSlopeColName)
00343       {
00344         _MIPSlopeCol = col;
00345         _MIPSlopeChanged = true;
00346       }
00347     else if (colName == _gainConstantColName)
00348       {
00349         _gainConstantCol = col;
00350         _gainConstantChanged = true;
00351       }
00352     else if (colName == _gainSlopeColName)
00353       {
00354         _gainSlopeCol = col;
00355         _gainSlopeChanged = true;
00356       }
00357     else if (colName == _interCalibrationColName)
00358       {
00359         _interCalibrationCol = col;
00360         _interCalibrationChanged = true;
00361       }
00362     else if (colName == _pedestalColName)
00363       {
00364         _pedestalCol = col;
00365         _pedestalChanged = true;
00366       }
00367     else if (colName == _temperatureColName)
00368       {
00369         _temperatureCol = col;
00370         _temperatureChanged = true;
00371       }
00372     else if (colName == _saturationColName)
00373       {
00374         _saturationCol = col;
00375         _saturationChanged = true;
00376       }
00377     else if (colName == _saturationParametersColName)
00378       {
00379         _saturationParametersCol = col;
00380         _saturationParametersChanged = true;
00381       }
00382     else if (colName == _pixelScaleFactorsColName)
00383       {
00384         _pixelScaleFactorsCol = col;
00385         _pixelScaleFactorsChanged = true;
00386       }
00387     else if (colName == _cellQualityColName)
00388       {
00389         _cellQualityCol = col;
00390         _cellQualityChanged = true;
00391       }
00392 
00393     else {
00394       const std::list<lccd::IConditionsHandler*> theList = this->handlerList();
00395       std::cout<<"AAA "<<theList.size()<<std::endl;
00396 
00397       for(std::list<lccd::IConditionsHandler*>::const_iterator it=theList.begin();it != theList.end();++it){
00398         std::cout << "AAA handler:" << (*it)->name() << std::endl;
00399         if( col == (*it)->defaultCollection()){
00400           std::cout << "using default collection" << std::endl;
00401         }
00402       }
00403 
00404       streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Called as conditions listener for collection " << colName << ", but not responsible." << std::endl;
00405       throw StopProcessingException(this);
00406     }
00407   }
00408 
00409   /***************************************************************************************/
00410   /*                                                                                     */
00411   /*                                                                                     */
00412   /* functions to do the actual update (or initialisation) of the calibrations           */
00413   /*                                                                                     */
00414   /*                                                                                     */
00415   /***************************************************************************************/
00416   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updateMIPCalibration()
00417   {
00418     if (!_MIPSlopeCol)
00419       {
00420         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update MIP, MIP slope collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00421         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00422       }
00423 
00424     if (!_MIPConstantCol )
00425       {
00426         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update MIP, MIP constant collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00427         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00428       }
00429 
00430     float defaultMIPConstant      = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00431     float defaultMIPConstantError = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00432 
00433     float defaultMIPConstantReferencePoint      = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePoint");
00434     float defaultMIPConstantReferencePointError = _MIPConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePointError");
00435 
00436     float defaultMIPSlope      = _MIPSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00437     float defaultMIPSlopeError = _MIPSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00438 
00439     MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>    *slopes    = new MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>(_mapper);
00440     MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant> *constants = new MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant>(_mapper);
00441 
00442     if ( !_useDBDefaultValuesOnly) {
00443 
00444     for (int i = 0; i < _MIPSlopeCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00445       {
00446         LinearFitSlope *slope = new LinearFitSlope( _MIPSlopeCol->getElementAt(i) );
00447 
00448         try
00449           {
00450             slopes->fillByModuleID(slope->getID(),slope);
00451           }
00452         catch(BadDataException& e)
00453           {
00454             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateMIPCalibration(): invalid module id " << slope->getID()
00455                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00456           }
00457       }
00458 
00459     for (int i = 0; i < _MIPConstantCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00460       {
00461         LinearFitConstant *constant = new LinearFitConstant( _MIPConstantCol->getElementAt(i) );
00462        try
00463           {
00464             constants->fillByModuleID(constant->getID(),constant);
00465           }
00466         catch(BadDataException& e)
00467           {
00468             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateMIPCalibration(): invalid module id " << constant->getID()
00469                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00470           }
00471       }
00472     }
00473 
00474     for ( std::vector<SiPMCalibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00475       {
00476         /* remove old MIP calibration*/
00477         if ( (*iter)->getMIP() ) delete (*iter)->getMIP();
00478 
00479         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00480         SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00481 
00482         LinearFitSlope *slope = slopes->getByCellID(ID);
00483         LinearFitConstant *constant = constants->getByCellID(ID);
00484 
00485         LinearFitCompound *mip = 0;
00486 
00487         bits.setMIPConstantDefault(false);
00488         bits.setMIPSlopeDefault(false);
00489         if ( constant && slope )
00490           {
00491               mip = new LinearFitCompound(constant, slope);
00492             }
00493         else if ( constant && !slope )
00494           {         
00495               mip = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00496                                           constant->getConstant(),
00497                                           constant->getConstantError(),
00498                                           constant->getConstantReferencePoint(),
00499                                           constant->getConstantReferencePointError(),
00500                                           defaultMIPSlope,
00501                                           defaultMIPSlopeError
00502                                           );
00503             bits.setMIPSlopeDefault();
00504           }
00505         else if ( !constant && slope )
00506           {
00507               mip = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00508                                           defaultMIPConstant,
00509                                           defaultMIPConstantError,
00510                                           defaultMIPConstantReferencePoint,
00511                                           defaultMIPConstantReferencePointError,
00512                                           slope->getSlope(),
00513                                           slope->getSlopeError()
00514                                           );
00515             bits.setMIPConstantDefault();
00516           }
00517         else
00518           {
00519               mip = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00520                                           defaultMIPConstant,
00521                                           defaultMIPConstantError,
00522                                           defaultMIPConstantReferencePoint,
00523                                           defaultMIPConstantReferencePointError,
00524                                           defaultMIPSlope,
00525                                           defaultMIPSlopeError
00526                                           );
00527             bits.setMIPConstantDefault();
00528             bits.setMIPSlopeDefault();
00529           }
00530 
00531         if (_MIPConstantScaled) {
00532           mip->setConstant( mip->getConstant() * _MIPConstantScaleFactor );
00533           mip->setConstantError( mip->getConstantError() * _MIPConstantScaleFactor );
00534           bits.setMIPConstantScaled();
00535         }
00536         else {
00537           bits.setMIPConstantScaled(false);
00538         }
00539 
00540         if (_MIPSlopeScaled) {
00541           mip->setSlope( mip->getSlope() * _MIPSlopeScaleFactor );
00542           mip->setSlopeError( mip->getSlopeError() * _MIPSlopeScaleFactor );
00543           bits.setMIPSlopeScaled();
00544         }
00545         else {
00546           bits.setMIPSlopeScaled(false);
00547         }
00548 
00549         (*iter)->setMIP(mip);
00550         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00551 
00552 
00553       }/*------------- end iteration over SiPMCalibrations --------------------*/
00554 
00555     _MIPConstantChanged = false;
00556     _MIPSlopeChanged    = false;
00557 
00558     delete slopes;
00559     delete constants;
00560 
00561   }
00562 
00563   /***************************************************************************************/
00564   /*                                                                                     */
00565   /*                                                                                     */
00566   /*                                                                                     */
00567   /***************************************************************************************/
00568   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updateGainCalibration()
00569   {
00570     if (!_gainSlopeCol)
00571       {
00572         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update gain, gain slope collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00573         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00574       }
00575 
00576     if (!_gainConstantCol )
00577       {
00578         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update gain, gain constant collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00579         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00580       }
00581 
00582     float defaultGainConstant      = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00583     float defaultGainConstantError = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00584 
00585     float defaultGainConstantReferencePoint      = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePoint");
00586     float defaultGainConstantReferencePointError = _gainConstantCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultReferencePointError");
00587 
00588     float defaultGainSlope      = _gainSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00589     float defaultGainSlopeError = _gainSlopeCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00590 
00591     MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>    *slopes    = new MappedContainer<LinearFitSlope>(_mapper);
00592     MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant> *constants = new MappedContainer<LinearFitConstant>(_mapper);
00593 
00594     if ( !_useDBDefaultValuesOnly) {
00595 
00596     for (int i = 0; i < _gainSlopeCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00597       {
00598         LinearFitSlope *slope = new LinearFitSlope( _gainSlopeCol->getElementAt(i) );
00599         try
00600           {
00601             slopes->fillByModuleID(slope->getID(),slope);
00602           }
00603         catch(BadDataException& e)
00604           {
00605             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateGainCalibration(): invalid module id " << slope->getID()
00606                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00607           }
00608       }
00609 
00610     for (int i = 0; i < _gainConstantCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00611       {
00612         LinearFitConstant *constant = new LinearFitConstant( _gainConstantCol->getElementAt(i) );
00613         constants->fillByModuleID(constant->getID(), constant);
00614       }
00615     }
00616 
00617     for ( std::vector<SiPMCalibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00618       {
00619         /* remove old gain calibration*/
00620         if ( (*iter)->getGain() ) delete (*iter)->getGain();
00621 
00622         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00623         SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00624 
00625         LinearFitSlope *slope = slopes->getByCellID(ID);
00626         LinearFitConstant *constant = constants->getByCellID(ID);
00627 
00628         LinearFitCompound *gain = 0;
00629 
00630         bits.setGainConstantDefault(false);
00631         bits.setGainSlopeDefault(false);
00632         if ( constant && slope )
00633           {
00634               gain = new LinearFitCompound(constant, slope);
00635             }
00636         else if ( constant && !slope )
00637           {
00638             gain = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00639                                          constant->getConstant(),
00640                                          constant->getConstantError(),
00641                                          constant->getConstantReferencePoint(),
00642                                          constant->getConstantReferencePointError(),
00643                                          defaultGainSlope,
00644                                          defaultGainSlopeError
00645                                          );
00646             bits.setGainSlopeDefault();
00647           }
00648         else if ( !constant && slope )
00649           {
00650             gain = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00651                                          defaultGainConstant,
00652                                          defaultGainConstantError,
00653                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePoint,
00654                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePointError,
00655                                          slope->getSlope(),
00656                                          slope->getSlopeError()
00657                                          );
00658             bits.setGainConstantDefault();
00659           }
00660         else
00661           {
00662             gain = new LinearFitCompound(ID,
00663                                          defaultGainConstant,
00664                                          defaultGainConstantError,
00665                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePoint,
00666                                          defaultGainConstantReferencePointError,
00667                                          defaultGainSlope,
00668                                          defaultGainSlopeError
00669                                          );
00670             bits.setGainConstantDefault();
00671             bits.setGainSlopeDefault();
00672           }
00673 
00674 
00675         if (_gainConstantScaled) {
00676           gain->setConstant( gain->getConstant() * _gainConstantScaleFactor );
00677           gain->setConstantError( gain->getConstantError() * _gainConstantScaleFactor );
00678           bits.setGainConstantScaled();
00679         }
00680         else {
00681           bits.setGainConstantScaled(false);
00682         }
00683 
00684         if (_gainSlopeScaled) {
00685           gain->setSlope( gain->getSlope() * _gainSlopeScaleFactor );
00686           gain->setSlopeError( gain->getSlopeError() * _gainSlopeScaleFactor );
00687           bits.setGainSlopeScaled();
00688         }
00689         else {
00690           bits.setGainSlopeScaled(false);
00691         }
00692 
00693         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00694         (*iter)->setGain(gain);
00695 
00696 
00697       }/*------------- end iteration over SiPMCalibrations --------------------*/
00698 
00699     _gainConstantChanged = false;
00700     _gainSlopeChanged    = false;
00701 
00702     delete slopes;
00703     delete constants;
00704 
00705   }
00706   /***************************************************************************************/
00707   /*                                                                                     */
00708   /*                                                                                     */
00709   /*                                                                                     */
00710   /***************************************************************************************/
00711   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updatePedestal()
00712   {
00713     if (!_pedestalCol)
00714       {
00715         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update pedestal, pedestal collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00716         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00717       }
00718 
00719     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *pedestalContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
00720     for (int i = 0; i < _pedestalCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00721       {
00722         SimpleValue *pedestalVal = new SimpleValue(_pedestalCol->getElementAt(i));
00723         try
00724           {
00725             pedestalContainer->fillByCellID(pedestalVal->getCellID(), pedestalVal);
00726           }
00727 
00728         catch(BadDataException& e)
00729           {
00730             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updatePedestal(): invalid module id " << pedestalVal->getCellID()
00731                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00732           }
00733       }
00734 
00735     for ( std::vector<SiPMCalibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00736       {
00737         /*delete old pedestal values*/
00738         if ( (*iter)->getPedestal() ) delete (*iter)->getPedestal();
00739 
00740         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00741         SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00742 
00743         /*
00744           just to be safe, create a temporary simple value
00745           (we delete the container in the end, and the SimpleValue does not
00746           belong to us)
00747         */
00748         SimpleValue *pedestalTemp = pedestalContainer->getByCellID(ID);
00749         SimpleValue *pedestal = NULL;
00750         if (pedestalTemp == NULL)
00751           {
00752             pedestal = new SimpleValue(ID,
00753                                        0., /*value*/
00754                                        0., /*error*/
00755                                        1   /*status*/
00756                                        );
00757             bits.setNoPedestal();
00758           }
00759         else
00760           {
00761               pedestal = new SimpleValue(pedestalTemp->getCellID(),
00762                                          pedestalTemp->getValue(),
00763                                          pedestalTemp->getError(),
00764                                          pedestalTemp->getStatus());
00765               bits.setNoPedestal(false);
00766           }
00767         
00768         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00769         (*iter)->setPedestal(pedestal);
00770       }
00771 
00772     _pedestalChanged = false;
00773 
00774     delete pedestalContainer;
00775 
00776   }
00777 
00778 
00779 
00780   /***************************************************************************************/
00781   /*                                                                                     */
00782   /*                                                                                     */
00783   /*                                                                                     */
00784   /***************************************************************************************/
00785   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updateTemperature()
00786   {
00787     if (!_temperatureCol)
00788       {
00789         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update temperature, temperature collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00790         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00791       }
00792 
00793     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *temperatureContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
00794     for (int i = 0; i < _temperatureCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00795       {
00796         SimpleValue *temperatureVal = new SimpleValue(_temperatureCol->getElementAt(i));
00797         try
00798           {
00799             //temperatureContainer->fillByCellID(temperatureVal->getCellID(), temperatureVal);
00800             temperatureContainer->fillByModuleID(temperatureVal->getCellID(), temperatureVal);
00801           }
00802 
00803         catch(BadDataException& e)
00804           {
00805             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateTemperature(): invalid module id " << temperatureVal->getCellID()
00806                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00807           }
00808       }
00809 
00810     for ( std::vector<SiPMCalibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00811       {
00812         /*delete old pedestal values*/
00813         if ( (*iter)->getTemperature() ) delete (*iter)->getTemperature();
00814 
00815         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00816         SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00817 
00818         /*
00819           just to be safe, create a temporary simple value
00820           (we delete the container in the end, and the SimpleValue does not
00821           belong to us)
00822         */
00823         SimpleValue *temperatureTemp = temperatureContainer->getByCellID(ID);
00824         SimpleValue *temperature = NULL;
00825         if (temperatureTemp == NULL)
00826           {
00827             temperature = new SimpleValue(ID,
00828                                           0., /*value*/
00829                                           0., /*error*/
00830                                           1   /*status*/
00831                                           );
00832             bits.setNoTemperature();
00833           }
00834         else
00835           {
00836             temperature = new SimpleValue(temperatureTemp->getCellID(),
00837                                           temperatureTemp->getValue(),
00838                                           temperatureTemp->getError(),
00839                                           temperatureTemp->getStatus());
00840               bits.setNoTemperature(false);
00841           }
00842         
00843         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00844         (*iter)->setTemperature(temperature);
00845       }
00846 
00847     _temperatureChanged = false;
00848 
00849     delete temperatureContainer;
00850 
00851   }
00852 
00853   /***************************************************************************************/
00854   /*                                                                                     */
00855   /*                                                                                     */
00856   /*                                                                                     */
00857   /***************************************************************************************/
00858   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updateInterCalibration()
00859   {
00860     if (!_interCalibrationCol)
00861       {
00862         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update inter-calibration, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00863         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00864       }
00865 
00866     float defaultInterCalibration      = _interCalibrationCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultValue");
00867     float defaultInterCalibrationError = _interCalibrationCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultError");
00868 
00869     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *interCalibContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
00870 
00871     if ( !_useDBDefaultValuesOnly) {
00872 
00873     for (int i = 0; i < _interCalibrationCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00874       {
00875         LinearFitConstant interCalib(_interCalibrationCol->getElementAt(i));
00876         SimpleValue *interCalibValue = new SimpleValue(interCalib.getID(),
00877                                            interCalib.getConstant(),
00878                                            interCalib.getConstantError(),
00879                                            1);/*status*/
00880         try
00881           {
00882             interCalibContainer->fillByModuleID(interCalibValue->getCellID(), interCalibValue);
00883           }
00884         catch(BadDataException& e)
00885           {
00886             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateInterCalibration(): invalid module id " << interCalibValue->getCellID()
00887                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00888           }
00889       }
00890     }
00891 
00892     for ( std::vector<SiPMCalibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
00893       {
00894         /*delete old inter-calibration values*/
00895         if ( (*iter)->getInterCalibration() ) delete (*iter)->getInterCalibration();
00896 
00897         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
00898         SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
00899 
00900         /*
00901           just to be safe, create a temporary simple value
00902           (we delete the container in the end, and the SimpleValue does not
00903           belong to us)
00904         */
00905         SimpleValue *interCalibrationTemp = interCalibContainer->removeByCellID(ID);
00906         SimpleValue *interCalibration = NULL;
00907 
00908         if (interCalibrationTemp == NULL)
00909           {
00910               interCalibration = new SimpleValue(ID,
00911                                                  defaultInterCalibration,
00912                                                  defaultInterCalibrationError,
00913                                                  1   /*status*/
00914                                                  );
00915             bits.setInterCalibrationDefault();
00916           }
00917         else
00918           {
00919               interCalibration = new SimpleValue(interCalibrationTemp->getCellID(),
00920                                                  interCalibrationTemp->getValue(),
00921                                                  interCalibrationTemp->getError(),
00922                                                  interCalibrationTemp->getStatus());
00923             bits.setInterCalibrationDefault(false);
00924           }
00925 
00926         if (_interCalibrationScaled) {
00927           interCalibration->setValue( interCalibration->getValue() * _interCalibrationScaleFactor );
00928           interCalibration->setError( interCalibration->getError() * _interCalibrationScaleFactor );
00929           bits.setInterCalibrationScaled();
00930         }
00931         else {
00932           bits.setInterCalibrationScaled(false);
00933         }
00934 
00935         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
00936         (*iter)->setInterCalibration(interCalibration);
00937       }
00938 
00939     _interCalibrationChanged = false;
00940 
00941     delete interCalibContainer;
00942 
00943   }
00944   /***************************************************************************************/
00945   /*                                                                                     */
00946   /*                                                                                     */
00947   /*                                                                                     */
00948   /***************************************************************************************/
00949   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updateSaturation()
00950   {
00951     if (!_saturationCol)
00952       {
00953         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update saturation, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
00954         throw StopProcessingException(this);
00955       }
00956 
00957     bool individualScaling        = parameterSet("PixelScaleFactorsCollection");
00958 
00959     MappedContainer<SatCorrItep> *saturationContainer        = new MappedContainer<SatCorrItep>(_mapper);
00960 
00961    if ( !_useDBDefaultValuesOnly) {
00962 
00963     for (int i = 0; i < _saturationCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00964       {
00965         SatCorrItep *saturationFunc = new SatCorrItep(_saturationCol->getElementAt(i)); // this will make a copy of the data (not link against the data like SimpleValue)
00966         
00967         try
00968           {
00969             saturationContainer->fillByModuleID(saturationFunc->getIndex(), saturationFunc);
00970           }
00971 
00972         catch(BadDataException& e)
00973           {
00974             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " invalid module id " << saturationFunc->getIndex() <<", maybe incomplete installation "
00975                          <<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
00976           }
00977 
00978 
00979       }
00980    }
00981 
00982     MappedContainer<SimpleValue> *saturationScalingContainer = new MappedContainer<SimpleValue>(_mapper);
00983 
00984    if ( !_useDBDefaultValuesOnly) {
00985 
00986     if (_pixelScaleFactorsCol)
00987       {
00988         for (int i = 0; i < _pixelScaleFactorsCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
00989           {
00990             SimpleValue *scaleFactorObject = new SimpleValue(_pixelScaleFactorsCol->getElementAt(i)) ;
00991 
00992             if ( scaleFactorObject->getStatus() ) continue; // filter all with status != 0
00993 
00994             try
00995               {
00996                 saturationScalingContainer->fillByModuleID( scaleFactorObject->getCellID(), scaleFactorObject );
00997 
00998               }
00999             catch(BadDataException& e)
01000               {
01001                 streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " invalid module id " << scaleFactorObject->getCellID() <<", maybe incomplete installation "
01002                              << std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01003               }
01004           }
01005       }
01006     else
01007       {
01008         if ( individualScaling ) {
01009           streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update saturation, pixelScaleFactorsCollection collection " << _pixelScaleFactorsColName << " is set but not valid." << std::endl;
01010           throw StopProcessingException(this);
01011         }
01012       }
01013    }
01014 
01015     //applying the saturation curves parameters
01016 
01017     MappedContainer<SaturationParameters> *saturationParametersContainer = new MappedContainer<SaturationParameters>(_mapper);
01018 
01019     float saturationParametersdefaultEpsilon  = _saturationParametersCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultEpsilon");
01020     float saturationParametersdefaultFraction = _saturationParametersCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultFraction");
01021     float saturationParametersdefaultNpix     = _saturationParametersCol->getParameters().getFloatVal("defaultNpix");
01022 
01023    if ( !_useDBDefaultValuesOnly) {
01024 
01025     if (_saturationParametersCol)
01026       {
01027         for (int i = 0; i < _saturationParametersCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
01028           {
01029             SaturationParameters *sp = new SaturationParameters(_saturationParametersCol->getElementAt(i)) ;
01030 
01031             try
01032               {
01033                 saturationParametersContainer->fillByModuleID( sp->getCellID(), sp );
01034               }
01035             catch(BadDataException& e)
01036               {
01037                 streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " invalid module id " << sp->getCellID() <<", maybe incomplete installation "
01038                              << std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01039               }
01040           }
01041       }
01042     else
01043       {
01044           streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update saturation, SaturationParameters collection " << _saturationParametersColName << " is set but not valid." << std::endl;
01045           throw StopProcessingException(this);
01046       }
01047    }
01048 
01049     for ( std::vector<SiPMCalibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
01050       {
01051         /*delete old saturation*/
01052         if ( (*iter)->getSaturationCorrection() ) delete (*iter)->getSaturationCorrection();
01053 
01054         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
01055         SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
01056 
01057         // clear default bits
01058         bits.setPixelScaleDefault(false);
01059         bits.setSaturationCorrectionDefault(false);
01060 
01061 
01062         SatCorrItep *saturation = saturationContainer->removeByCellID(ID); // we can savely use these, as data was copied and not linked
01063         
01064         if (saturation == NULL) // if there was nothing, generate a default scaling
01065           {
01066             HcalTileIndex hti(ID);
01067             const int nPoints = 20;
01068             float pixels[nPoints] = {0};
01069             float pmts[nPoints] = {0};
01070 
01071             saturation = new SatCorrItep(hti, nPoints, pixels, pmts);
01072             bits.setSaturationCorrectionDefault();
01073           }
01074 
01075         SimpleValue *individualScalingFactor = saturationScalingContainer->getByCellID(ID);
01076 
01077         float scalingFactor = 1.;
01078 
01079         if ( individualScalingFactor || _useIndividualScaleFactor ) {
01080           scalingFactor = individualScalingFactor->getValue();
01081         }
01082         else {
01083           scalingFactor = _globalPixelScaleFactor;
01084           if ( individualScaling ) bits.setPixelScaleDefault();
01085         }
01086 
01087         if ( _saturationCorrectionScaled ) {
01088           scalingFactor = scalingFactor * _saturationCorrectionScaleFactor;
01089           bits.setPixelScaleScaled();
01090         }
01091         else {
01092           bits.setPixelScaleScaled(false);
01093         }
01094         saturation->setScaling(scalingFactor);
01095 
01096         if (!_useDBDefaultValuesOnly){
01097           SaturationParameters *saturationPar = saturationParametersContainer->getByCellID(ID);
01098           saturation->setFunParameters(saturationPar->getNpix(), saturationPar->getFraction(), saturationPar->getEpsilon());
01099         }
01100         else {
01101           saturation->setFunParameters(saturationParametersdefaultNpix,saturationParametersdefaultFraction,saturationParametersdefaultEpsilon);
01102         }
01103         saturation->setProcedureType(_saturationProcedureType);
01104 
01105 
01106         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01107         (*iter)->setSaturationCorrection(saturation);
01108       }
01109 
01110     _saturationChanged = false;
01111     _saturationParametersChanged = false;
01112     _pixelScaleFactorsChanged = false;
01113 
01114     delete saturationContainer;
01115     delete saturationScalingContainer;
01116     delete saturationParametersContainer;
01117   } 
01118 
01119   /***************************************************************************************/
01120   /*                                                                                     */
01121   /*                                                                                     */
01122   /*                                                                                     */
01123   /***************************************************************************************/
01124   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updateCellQuality()
01125   {
01126     if (!_cellQualityCol)
01127       {
01128         streamlog_out(ERROR) << "Cannot update bad cells, collection is not valid." << std::endl;
01129         throw StopProcessingException(this);
01130       }
01131 
01132     MappedContainer<CellQuality> *cellQualityContainer = new MappedContainer<CellQuality>(_mapper);
01133 
01134    if ( !_useDBDefaultValuesOnly) {
01135 
01136     for (int i = 0; i < _cellQualityCol->getNumberOfElements(); ++i)
01137       {
01138         CellQuality *cellQuality = new CellQuality(_cellQualityCol->getElementAt(i));
01139 
01140         try
01141           {
01142             cellQualityContainer->fillByModuleID(cellQuality->getCellID(), cellQuality);
01143           }
01144         catch(BadDataException& e)
01145           {
01146             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " updateCellQuality(): invalid module id " << cellQuality->getCellID()
01147                          <<", maybe incomplete installation "<<std::endl<<  e.what() << std::endl;
01148           }
01149       }
01150    }
01151 
01152     for ( std::vector<SiPMCalibrations*>::iterator iter = _allCalibrations.begin(); iter != _allCalibrations.end(); ++iter)
01153       {
01154         int ID = (*iter)->getCellID();
01155         SiPMCalibrationStatusBits bits = SiPMCalibrationStatusBits( (*iter)->getStatus() );
01156 
01157         CellQuality *cellQuality = cellQualityContainer->getByCellID(ID);
01158         if (cellQuality != NULL) bits.setDead();
01159         else bits.setDead(false);
01160 
01161         (*iter)->setStatus(bits.getInt());
01162       }
01163 
01164     _cellQualityChanged = false;
01165     delete cellQualityContainer;
01166 
01167   }
01168 
01169 
01170   /***************************************************************************************/
01171   /*                                                                                     */
01172   /*                                                                                     */
01173   /*                                                                                     */
01174   /***************************************************************************************/
01175   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::updateMapping()
01176   {
01177     /*clear all objects in the container*/
01178     _container->clear();
01179 
01180     /*
01181      * initialise the container with SiPMCalibration objects for all valid cellIDs
01182      */
01183     for ( CellIterator iter = _mapper->begin(); iter != _mapper->end(); ++iter)
01184       {
01185         int cellID = *iter;
01186         SiPMCalibrations *thisCell = new SiPMCalibrations();
01187         thisCell->setCellID( cellID );
01188         thisCell->setCellIDEncoding( _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding() );
01189         _container->fillByCellID( cellID, thisCell );
01190       }
01191 
01192     _allCalibrations = _container->getAllElements();
01193   }
01194 
01195 
01196   /***************************************************************************************/
01197   /*                                                                                     */
01198   /*                                                                                     */
01199   /*                                                                                     */
01200   /***************************************************************************************/
01201   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::processEvent( LCEvent *evt )
01202   {
01203     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n EVENT: "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<std::endl;
01204 
01205     if (_mapperVersion != _mapper->getVersion()) this->updateMapping();
01206     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
01207 
01208     /* checks if rebuilding of calibration constants is necessary  */
01209     if (_MIPConstantChanged  || _MIPSlopeChanged)  updateMIPCalibration();
01210     if (_gainConstantChanged || _gainSlopeChanged) updateGainCalibration();
01211     if (_pedestalChanged)         updatePedestal();
01212     if (_temperatureChanged)      updateTemperature();
01213     if (_interCalibrationChanged) updateInterCalibration();
01214 
01215     if ( _saturationChanged || _saturationParametersChanged
01216          || _pixelScaleFactorsChanged ) updateSaturation();
01217 
01218     if (_cellQualityChanged)      updateCellQuality();
01219   }
01220 
01221 
01222 
01223   /***************************************************************************************/
01224   /*                                                                                     */
01225   /*                                                                                     */
01226   /*                                                                                     */
01227   /***************************************************************************************/
01228   void SiPMCalibrationsProcessor::end()
01229   {
01230     delete _SiPMCalibrationsContainerMap[name()];
01231     _SiPMCalibrationsContainerMap.erase(name());
01232     _container = NULL;
01233   }
01234 
01235 
01236   /***************************************************************************************
01237    * create instance to make processor known to Marlin
01238    * should be very last thing to do, to prevent order problems during
01239    * deletion of static objects.
01240    ***************************************************************************************/
01241   SiPMCalibrationsProcessor aSiPMCalibrationsProcessor;
01242 
01243 } // end namespace CALICE
